description: Rerank documents using the Cohere API.

api_key.info: The Cohere API Key to use for reranking.

model.info: The Cohere reranking model to use. V3.0 models offer improved performance over V2.0.

success.compressor_created: Cohere reranker created successfully with model: {model}, top_n: {top_n}

errors.cohere_not_installed: Please install langchain-cohere to use the Cohere model.
errors.creation_failed: Failed to create Cohere reranker. Please verify your API key and try again. Error: {error}

logs.initializing: Initializing Cohere reranker with model: {model}, top_n: {top_n}
